AmielJohn.lore: Fires arrows while snacking. Hits sometimes; appetite always. Has been seen using beef jerky as emergency ammo.

ans2pid.lore: Plays tactical chess with crossbow... mostly hits scenery. The trees have a restraining order.

Azryth.lore: Throws daggers stylishly; debates bat supremacy with Batghost mid-combo. Currently losing the argument.

Batghost.lore: Haunts the battlefield. Mostly scares teammates, enemies occasionally. Voted 'Most Likely to Make Allies Scream' three years running.

Draxiimov.lore: Shoots arrows of chaos; monsters die laughing instead of fighting. Weaponized cringe so powerful it violates the Geneva Convention.

Goblok.lore: Wields a massive greatsword... and wisdom rarely. Leads raids in unpredictable patterns. GPS has given up on providing directions.

Hesucrypto.lore: Shoots arrows of investment advice. Gold golems spawn randomly. Lost more guild funds than battles, somehow still Vice Leader.

Iguro.lore: Crossbow shots teleport unpredictably; allies dodge or join enemies. Has accidentally recruited three bosses to the guild.

Inihaw.lore: Defends allies while firing grills of doom. Battlefield doubles as BBQ. Enemies die from heart disease before combat damage.

Jalo.lore: Arrows and useless facts fly simultaneously; accuracy optional. Once lectured a dragon about its poor dental hygiene mid-fight. Dragon fled.

LXRDGRIM.lore: Shoots arrows that hug and confuse; brooding optional. Enemies request therapy after encounters. Brooding still mandatory.

ShionXT.lore: Swings sword, barely blocks; heroic poses included for flair. Has mastered the art of looking epic while accomplishing nothing.

zadaku.lore: Blocks and schemes; usually forgets the plan mid-battle. Has 47 half-completed strategies and zero completed victories.

Andrina.lore: Shoots from darkness; sometimes hits the wrong side... but looks cool doing it. Style points awarded, victory points questionable.

BabyDoge.lore: Arrows bark; morale boosts and chaos ensue. Every shot sounds like a motivational chihuahua. Enemies confused. Allies inspired?

BronnyJames.lore: Tries to set everything on fire with bolts; succeeds occasionally... accidentally. Guild insurance premiums have tripled.

Byakko.lore: Terrifies enemies with bolts and booming roars. Volume: max. Accuracy: variable. Intimidation: effective. Hearing loss: inevitable.

Carrera.lore: Fast bolts, rarely hits target, style guaranteed. Moves so fast even their own arrows can't keep up. Physics weeps.

CheeseCakee.lore: Shoots cakes that explode on contact. Sweet, deadly, and surprisingly moist. Bosses die diabetic and satisfied.

Chunchunmaru.lore: Swings massive sword; mounted chaos included. Named sword after... that. Enemies die laughing. Strategy working as intended.

CobRa.lore: Shoots arrows while setting traps; stealth optional. Once trapped self for three hours. Enemy felt bad and left.

Daleee.lore: Casts spells that buff allies... unintentionally. Meant to curse boss, accidentally made teammates immortal. Happy accidents only.

EoriuX.lore: Strikes fast; mostly hits self by accident. Owns more bandages than weapons. Tetanus shots on speed dial.

erwarrr.lore: Spells mixed with screams; morale questionable. Volume compensates for spell accuracy. Enemies surrender to stop the noise.

Evand3r.lore: Uses shiny objects as magical weapons; results vary. Once defeated a boss with a spoon. Refuses to explain how or why.

Fever.lore: Arrows spread confusion; monsters unsure what's happening. Chaos field so strong reality.exe has stopped responding.

Gehrmann.lore: Punches ideas and enemies equally; chaos guaranteed. Philosophy major turned fighter. Enemies defeated by existential crisis.

Hercules.lore: Fights and dances; enemies confused, allies too. Guild unsure if he's fighting or auditioning. Bosses die entertained.

IZANAGI.lore: Massive sword swings; brooding heroics optional. Has three facial expressions: brood, brood harder, occasional brood with hint of smile.

JEBER89.lore: Blocks attacks; presses imaginary buttons that occasionally work. Shield has QTE minigame only he can see. Critics rate gameplay 7/10.

M1ssy.lore: Shoots arrows; chaos guaranteed, snacks mandatory. Will pause mid-battle for snack break. Priorities: snacks, chaos, victory (in that order).

Maria.lore: Punches everything; debates with Marsha11 over loot mid-fight. Has landed more arguments than punches. Winning both battles.

Marsha11.lore: Blocks and argues with Maria constantly; guild morale rises anyway. Fights synchronized: 50% combat, 50% sibling rivalry. Entertainment value: priceless.

MOTHRA.lore: Shield ready; giant-scale destruction inevitable. Defensive stance causes more collateral damage than enemy attacks. Guild rebuilds monthly.

Munchyy.lore: Shoots arrows after meals; deadly and polite. Sends apology notes with every kill. Enemies die confused but respected.

Nyegerls.lore: Punches and casts spells unpredictably; chaos ensues. Multiclassed accidentally. Still doesn't know which class. Neither do enemies.

OneCrit.lore: Blocks and swings; critical hits land randomly on friend or foe. RNG incarnate. Teammates wear helmets near him. Just in case.

Pinchy.lore: Staff attacks; pinches enemies magically. Small but terrifying. Bosses fear the pinch. Guild medics fear carpal tunnel epidemic.

PotatoCheese.lore: Shoots potatoes that buff allies; delicious chaos. Arrows provide +10 carbs, +5 morale. Side effects: comfort, mild confusion, sudden hunger.

Seoo.lore: Stealthy shots; trips over shadows. Master of stealth. Except walking. And breathing quietly. And existing subtly. Perfect spy material.

Varys.lore: Knows all secrets; shares some at random. Guild gossip network administrator. Information accuracy: 60%. Entertainment value: 100%.

Snowy.lore: Swings greatsword; freezes enemies... sometimes allies too. Friendly fire incidents: classified. Apologies: seasonal. Frostbite: constant.

Wandote.lore: Spells cast themselves... unpredictably. Wand has sentience and attitude. Wizard argues with weapon daily. Wand winning most debates.

xLunox.lore: Moonlit swings; dramatic entrances required. Cannot attack without entrance music. Battles delayed 3-5 minutes for proper ambiance. Worth it.

ZenP4kTo.lore: Arrows inspire enemies accidentally; chaos guaranteed. Motivational speaker energy with terrible aim. Bosses receive confidence boost. Guild confused.

Ztig.lore: Shoots wildly; friend or foe unclear. Friendly fire rate: impressive. Accuracy: concerning. Banned from three raids. Showed up anyway.

dmzPapa.lore: Magic mixed with parental guidance; naps mandatory. Casts fireball, then lectures about responsibility. Bosses defeated by dad jokes. Effective but painful.

Exitium.lore: Shoots arrows with flair; dramatic exits optional. Every shot has soliloquy. Enemies die waiting for monologue to end. Encore demanded.

azlamey.lore: Master of accidental disasters. Sabotages missions unintentionally. Guild suspects double agent. Reality: just really unlucky. Or talented?

Skadushy.lore: Swings massive greatsword at shadows; snacks on darkness between strikes. Enemies confused by shadow-eating warrior with oversized blade. Nutritionists baffled.

Mervzs.lore: Purpose unknown; potentially dangerous. Collects shiny orbs. Maybe spells? Maybe decorative? Guild doesn't ask. Too afraid of answer.

Crestia.lore: Ignored often; decisive when least expected. Silent 99% of time. That 1%? Saves entire raid. Then returns to silence. Legend.

Sweeney.lore: Friend or foe? Identity questionable. Alignment changes hourly. Guild has conspiracy board dedicated to tracking loyalty. Board inconclusive. Probably fine.

Riku.lore: Weapon unknown. Fighting style undefined. Somehow effective. Guild debates if they're genius or just lucky. Bosses fear them regardless. Results speak louder than documentation.

jiR0.lore: Combat method classified. Enemies defeated by unknown means. Guild has theories: magic? stealth? intimidation? Reality: nobody dares ask. Too effective to question.

Maia.lore: Weapon choice remains elusive. Shows up, wins battles, refuses to elaborate. Guild gave up documenting combat style. Just grateful they're on our side. Probably.
